meanings.definition: Existing or occurring within a galaxy.
meanings.sent1: The intragalactic stars twinkle brightly in our galaxy.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study intragalactic phenomena to understand our galaxy better.
meanings.sent3: The intragalactic aliens threw a party in the Milky Way.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like intragalactic voyages through the cosmos.
meanings.sent5: The intragalactic nebula painted a stunning picture in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Relating to or situated within a galaxy.
meanings.sent1: Our telescopes capture amazing intragalactic images of distant stars.
meanings.sent2: The intragalactic exploration mission aimed to uncover secrets of our galaxy.
meanings.sent3: The intragalactic restaurant served cosmic cuisine to hungry space travelers.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an intragalactic map of the Milky Way's wonders.
meanings.sent5: The intragalactic music echoed through the vastness of space.
